DOC.brief_summary: This prospective multicenter clinical study evaluate safety effectiveness intracardiac septal closure device patient atrial septum defect ( ASD ) patent foramen ovale ( PFO ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Study Solysafe Septal Occluder Patients With Atrial Septum Defect Patent Foramen Ovale
DOC.criteria: ASD PFO medical history cryptogenic stroke due presume paradoxical embolism cause PFO Criteria exclude catheterization ( e.g . size small , disseminated intravascular coagulopathy ( DIC ) , high risk bleed coagulation clot disorder )
